meanings.definition: A medication used to treat depression.
meanings.sent1: She takes antidepressants every morning to help with her sadness.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed antidepressants to improve his mood.
meanings.sent3: The antidepressants and her positive attitude worked hand in hand to lift her spirits.
meanings.sent4: His smile was like a dose of antidepressants, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The colorful packaging of the antidepressants made them seem less daunting.

meanings.definition: A substance that counteracts or prevents depression.
meanings.sent1: Eating healthy food can act as natural antidepressants for some people.
meanings.sent2: The support of friends can sometimes be the best antidepressants.
meanings.sent3: The cute puppy was like an antidepressant, chasing away the gloom.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a powerful antidepressant, contagious and uplifting.
meanings.sent5: The beautiful sunset served as a natural antidepressant, calming her mind.
